0.title: Rad Awesome Moments
0.plot: Meet the show's creators Andreas Trolf, Jay Howell, and Jim Dirschberger and take a glimpse at the rad awesome way Sanjay & Craig see the world.

1.title: And Justice for Durdle/Beauty and the Beard
1.plot: Noodman files a lawsuit against Farmer Larry that could cost him Blueberry Farm and his beloved hounds. Sanjay is thrilled that Penny and Belle are sleeping over at his house, but an embarrassing video could ruin the night.

2.title: Hot Heads/Lundgren Loner
2.plot: The children hope to experience the ultimate coolness of Lake Lundgren; Sanjay must cope with spending an entire afternoon alone.

3.title: Bike-o Psycho/Boulder Rollers
3.plot: Sanjay and Craig find an abandoned bike and nurse it back to life, but they must deal with the owner who wants it back. The kids team up to push a boulder into Lake Lundgren.

4.title: Guitar Zeroes/Heartyface
4.plot: Sanjay and Craig seek out a mythic guitar legend. Craig becomes obsessed with gaining popularity on a social media website.

5.title: Galaxy Geeks/Freaks and Cheeks
5.plot: The epic "Alien Craig" fantasy space adventure continues with Noodman joining the kids on a new mission. Dog-sitting for Hector becomes Sanjay and Craig's worst nightmare.

6.title: Dude Snake Nood/Barrel Boyz
6.plot: Sanjay and Craig are forced on a "play date" with Noodman's nephew. Tufflips recruits Vijay to help pull off his greatest stunt: going over Lundgren's Butt Rock Falls in a wooden barrel.

7.title: All-Night Bummer Party/Partybot Returns
7.plot: The dudes celebrate their "friend-iversary" at a Frycade sleepover event, but the night doesn't go as Sanjay plans. Vijay showcases a reprogramed Partybot at a local tech expo.

8.title: Huggle Day
8.plot: After ruining Lundgren's Huggle Day celebration, Sanjay and Craig set out to right their wrong - with the help of movie hero Dolph Lundgren. Led by Dolph Lundgren, Sanjay and Craig journey to find Huggle Bunny.

9.title: Halloweenies/GUTS Busters
9.plot: The gang wishes every day was Halloween-so they decide to make it happen. Sanjay and Craig compete on a road-show version of the classic Nickelodeon series "G.U.T.S." Guest Stars: Mike O'Malley & Moira Quirk

10.title: Paper Pushers/Bros of a Feather
10.plot: Noodman tries to uncover Sanjay and Craig's racket of keeping money for newspapers they don't deliver. Sanjay and Craig take an orphaned baby bird under their wings.

11.title: Ain't No Fang/Balzalderac!
11.plot: Craig teaches Sanjay the art of being a snake. Sanjay and Craig's actions in the present affect a future episode from"season twelve."

12.title: Master Smashers/All Couped Up
12.plot: The dudes discover the primal satisfaction of smashing stuff. Sanjay and Craig enter a contest to win a new car.

13.title: Combo Attack/Stuffed Curse Pizza
13.plot: Megan makes an unlikely friend with Chido and struggles to keep it secret. After a string of clumsy accidents, Sanjay is convinced he's cursed.

14.title: Quietude Dudes/Diaper Dinks
14.plot: Sanjay and Craig compete to see who can be quiet the longest. The kids revert to babies and join Baby Richard on an adventure.

15.title: Man of Squel/Songjay
15.plot: Sanjay and Craig appeal to the people of Lundgren to watch the appearance of a rare double-comet. Sanjay and Craig have to stop Vijay's pig obsession.

16.title: JJ and Greg/Tuff Rider
16.plot: Sanjay and Craig become best buds with another dude-reptile duo, until they start to take over their lives. The kids try to recruit Tufflips for their bicycle gang and dedicate themselves to teaching him to ride.

17.title: The Sanjay and Craig Stunt School Special
17.plot: When Craig joins Sanjay at Stuntman Middle School, he finds that Sanjay is living in the shadow of an academic overachiever.

18.title: Friend Card/Beach Butts
18.plot: An old rivalry between Darlene and Noodman is reignited when the guys discover a Friend Card. Sanjay and Craig become beach bums for a day.

19.title: Space Train to Space/The Snake Pit
19.plot: Sanjay and Craig watch a Tufflips movie at the theatre and we follow Tufflip's story. Sanjay and Craig's friendship gets tested when the dudes discover a secret room and Craig turns it into his personal party zone.

20.title: Booyah for Bollywood
20.plot: Sanjay and Craig get to be in a Tufflips movie in India, so Vijay comes along to reconnect with his homeland and nothing turns out the way anyone expected.

0.title: A Show Is Born
0.plot: Get to know how Sanjay & Craig came to be with the show's creators Andreas Trolf, Jay Howell, and Jim Dirschberger. And their snake expert, Dave!

1.title: Brett Venom, M.D./Laugh Quake
1.plot: Sanjay and Craig infiltrate the hospital to see the world's first butt transplant.Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the ultimate laugh.

2.title: Maximum Denis/Dog Wave
2.plot: The boys go undercover to defend their video game dominance at the Frycade.Sanjay and Craig decide to get a dog but end up with 100 dogs.

3.title: Heightmare/Be Like Tufflips
3.plot: Sanjay is finally big enough to go on the scariest carnival ride, but can he survive it?Sanjay dresses like Remington Tufflips and is mistaken for his hero.

4.title: Stinkboy/Wolfie
4.plot: Sanjay runs away to live in the sewer when Craig can't handle his stench.Hector's sudden fascination with wolves gets on Sanjay and Craig's nerves.

5.title: Traffical Island/Partybot
5.plot: The kids turn against Sanjay when he maroons them all on a highway median.Sanjay and Craig find an old robot and become party animals.

6.title: The Giving G/Release the Craigan
6.plot: An amazing discovery at the junkyard causes trouble in the neighborhood.Craig steals Megan's identity and becomes a pageant queen.

7.title: Muscle C.O.P.S./Cold Hard Cash
7.plot: Sanjay grows giant calf muscles and joins a peculiar police force.Craig risks his life to help his best bud find a frozen treasure.

8.title: Unbarfable/Game On
8.plot: The search is on when Sanjay and Craig's favorite video game goes AWOL.Sanjay and Craig vow to make Hector barf for the first time ever.

9.title: Laked Nake/Doom Baby
9.plot: A good day at the lake goes bad when Sanjay loses his bathing suit.The dudes' decision to babysit Richard Dickson might cost Craig his life.

10.title: Blackout/Family Re-Noodman
10.plot: When the lights go out, Sanjay becomes the most powerful kid in town.The boys infiltrate Noodman's reunion in hopes of tasting special Frycade wings.

11.title: Fart Baby/Kung-Fu Catapult
11.plot: Sanjay and Craig are the proud parents of a baby fart.Sanjay and Craig agree to rid Tufflips' trailer of ghosts in return for a catapult.

12.title: Trouble Dare/Road Pizza
12.plot: The dudes play the Dicksons in an epic game of Family Double Dare.Craig gets possessed by an evil pizza demon that wants to destroy the Frycade.

13.title: Cup O' Universe/You're In Trouble
13.plot: The kids discover a universe in a milkshake cup. While at Tufflips overnight camp, the dudes do their best not to wet the bed.

14.title: Booger Johnson/Dream Rangers
14.plot: Craig can't stop eating Megan's pet gerbil. Sanjay and Craig must re-enter their dream to rescue Belle.

15.title: Day of the Snake/Prickerbeast
15.plot: Sanjay discovers all the awesome things Craig does when Sanjay's at school. The kids discover a local legend is a lie and get revenge on their parents.

16.title: Kerplunk'd/Old Farts
16.plot: Sanjay and Craig start a prank war with the ultimate prank master. Sanjay and Craig disguise themselves as senior citizens to get free wings.

17.title: Flip Flopas/Chill Bill
17.plot: When the kids eat candy that makes good things taste bad forever, they set out on a quest to find an antidote. A cool bass player who lives in an underground convenience store threatens to break up Sanjay and Craig's friendship.

18.title: Curb Dawgz/I Love Loogie
18.plot: Megan disguises herself as a tomboy to unwittingly convince Sanjay to be her partner at a dance competition. Sanjay, Craig, and Hector con their way into a rad-awesome skate crew.

19.title: A Tail of Two Slithers
19.plot: Craig meets his long-lost brother, Ronnie Slithers, who uses devious methods to try and turn the dudes against one another.

20.title: Boatin' Down the River/Pretty in Punk
20.plot: Sanjay and Craig are to blame when the Dicksons are seduced by fame and fortune.

0.title: Coolest Dude-Snake Duo Ever!
0.plot: Sing along with the coolest dude-snake duo ever, Sanjay and Craig!

1.title: Hot Sauce Boss/Ghost Pool
1.plot: The gang goes searching for a legendary pool in the forest; the guys build a homemade raft.

2.title: Shirts Off; Middle Shame
2.plot: Sanjay and Craig realize they can experience total freedom without shirts; Craig helps Sanjay.

3.title: Dolled Up/Space Race
3.plot: Things spiral out of control when Sanjay goes to ridiculous lengths to conceal that he and Craig were using Darlene's makeup kit. Sanjay takes credit for Craig's invention, but ends up almost losing his best friend.

4.title: Barfy's Babies/Butts Up Club
4.plot: Sanjay & Craig try to find the "hook" to help a boring puppy find a home. What starts as Sanjay & Craig playing a schoolyard game turns into a mythic adventure involving a girl in trouble and a villain called the Butt Master.

5.title: Screamday/Enter Sandman
5.plot: When Craig is unable to speak, Sanjay and Megan must travel inside him to find his Voice. Sanjay and Craig are thrilled The Dicksons invite them for a sleepover, but the family's oddities become more than they can handle

6.title: Alien Craig/Googas
6.plot: The kids are desperate to get the most popular toy in town, but their attempts are thwarted by an obnoxious kid. When Sanjay forgets to take out the garbage, a trip to the dump turns into a journey of galactic proportions.

7.title: Glad to Be Sad/Glory Hounds
7.plot: The boys get Megan kicked out of her prestigious club for winners;Sanjay and Craig hear a sad song that makes them feel better.

8.title: Tufflips' Tales of Terror
8.plot: Tufflips hosts a spooky, strange and shoddy half-hour Halloween special. Remington Tufflips and Huggle Bunny continue their series of spine-tingling tales.

9.title: Tuffcon/Pet Parents
9.plot: Sanjay is star-struck when he meets his favorite movie villain--until he discovers the actor is not so different from his devious onscreen personae. Sanjay and Craig discover a way to hypnotize Darlene and Vijay.

10.title: Cuddle Buddy/2 Tuff 2 Watch
10.plot: The kids stage a Tufflips movie-marathon, but staying awake through every cheesy flick proves tougher than they expected. Craig is desperate for cuddling after he sees the neighborhood pets receiving so much tender affection.

11.title: Ting/Farkwerk
11.plot: A symphony of farts;The children try to imagine the purpose of a mysterious object.

12.title: Foul Work/Rash Thrash
12.plot: Sanjay and Craig discover Belle's secret life when they get an opportunity to work at the Frycade; Sanjay develops an allergy to Craig.

13.title: Wild Buds/Depants Tag
13.plot: Sanjay and Craig make a bet about who can survive in the wild longer; a competitive game of de-pantsing sweeps the town.

14.title: Chewhuahuas/Space Invaders
14.plot: A group of young children idolize Sanjay and Craig; Hector bottles his divine-smelling perspiration and sells it as cologne.

15.title: Dangerous Debbie/D.I.N.K.
15.plot: A love-smitten Craig kidnaps an electric eel from the tank of a sushi restaurant; Sanjay and Craig are suspicious of Vijay's new high-tech car.

16.title: Romper Chomper/Conquistador
16.plot: Everyone searches for Megan's two front teeth; Sanjay and Craig are given a conquistador statue.

17.title: Street Dogg
17.plot: When rapper Street Dogg moves to Lundgren, Sanjay and Craig are shocked to learn about his past.

18.title: King of Kids/Ew De Hector
18.plot: The children are trapped on a dumpster surrounded by vicious Chihuahuas; Hector's close-talking tendency becomes an issue.

19.title: Snake Parts Unknown/Flabyrinth
19.plot: Sanjay and Craig take Anthony Gourmand on a Lundgren eating adventure; the boys win a tour of Tufflips' movie-themed labyrinth.

20.title: Serpentco/Chrome Dome
20.plot: The boys go under cover with Tufflips to investigate a crime ring that is pirating movies; Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the top of a lawyer's head on a billboard advertisement.

imdb.title: Sanjay and Craig
plot: The always odd and often gross-out adventures of a young boy named Sanjay Patel and his talking pet snake Craig.::Jade Suraparaju
